appname.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appdesc.message: This extension allows the user to display Deezer's current playing song in Discord status.
appdesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

cantSetStatusUserTokenNotSet.message: Can't set status, user token is not set.
cantSetStatusUserTokenNotSet.description: Can't set status because user token is not set.

apiLimitation.message: Due to the Discord API, you can't see your status changes in Discord, but other users can.
apiLimitation.description: Explanation of the discord API limitation who prevents showing self status changes.

userTokenFounds.message: User tokens found in Discord open tabs
userTokenFounds.description: User tokens found in Discord open tabs

howToFindToken.message: To find yourself your user token: open Discord in Chrome, press CTRL-SHIFT-I, go to the 'Application' tab and you'll find the token in Storage / Local Storage / https://discordapp.com in front of the key 'token'. (Don't copy the double quotes!)
